item.title: Essential Guide to Tech Migration: Why and How to Migrate from AngularJS to Angular
item.description: For countless applications built with AngularJS, a critical decision looms: migrate to Angular or risk stagnation.

item.title: Angular Provider
item.description: Angular Provider is like a command to Angular Dependency Injection system regarding how to get an object/instance for a particular dependency.
